mapper.insert: insert into display_column_label (DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, DISPLAY_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{displayColumnLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{displayId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{messageType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update display_column_label set INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DISPLAY_ID = #{displayId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID = #{displayColumnLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID,DISPLAY_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE,STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column_label where DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID = #{displayColumnLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID,DISPLAY_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column_label

select DISPLAY_COLUMN_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID,DISPLAY_ID,MESSAGE_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column_label where DISPLAY_ID = #{displayId}
